729579f-a.title: Richmond: St. Marks Place - Westervelt Avenue
729579f-a.text:
St. Marks Plaoe (extreme left), east from (No. 100) a point
300 yards east of Westervelt Avenue to Nicholas Street. The vantage
poirt is hhe old Stokes Mansion. In the background is visible the
Upper New York Bay.
March 1928
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729579f-a.folder: St. Marks Place & Westervelt Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729593f-c.title: Richmond: St. Marks Place - Westervelt Avenue
729593f-c.text:
St. Marks Place, north side, east of Westervelt Avenue,
showing St. Peters Roman Catholio Church. The view is west-
ward along St. Marks Place. View 1 was taken September, 1925;
view 2, May 2, 1928,and view 3, June 22, 1937.
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
View S. Neg a 797
729593f-c.folder: St. Marks Place & Westervelt Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729594f-b.title: Richmond: St. Marks Place - Westervelt Avenue
729594f-b.text:
St. Marks Place, north side, east of Westervelt Avenue,
showing St. Peters Roman Catholic Church. The house with the
dormer windows, adjoining the church, is the rectory. View 1
was taken March 10, 1928. Views 2 and 3 show the rear of the
church as seen from Richmond Terrace and were taken July 20, 1926
and April 26, 1937, respectively.
P. L. Sperr
NO RESPRODUCTIONS
729594f-b.folder: St. Marks Place & Westervelt Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729592f-a.title: Richmond: St. Marks Place - Westervelt Avenue
729592f-a.text:
St. Marks Place, east from Westervelt Avenue, showing
St. Peters Roman Catholic Church where the street makes a sharp bend.
May 2, 1228
P. L. Sperr
